parameters: \Y[4 32]\{After the ball, Cinderella still didn't like the prince, but the Cinderella who didn't like the prince loved
stars.Cinderella liked to help her loving stepmother and sisters clean up the beans scattered in the room.
\Y[4 3]\{She said she felt like she was picking up the stars scattered in the world.
\Y[4 6]\C[1]"Hmm~~Hardworking little Cinderella, loves picking up beans." (Taking notes)
\Y[4 3]\{The prince's witch friend thought it was a very troublesome and unhappy thing, so she asked the ants to help
Cinderella. But when the ants came back, they told the witch that Cinderella really liked doing this...
\Y[4 6]\C[1]"Hmm~~A witch who is afraid of trouble, her profession is a great druid, and she has a group of ant friends." (Taking notes x2)
\Y[4 7]\C[1]"Please, you're not even listening to the story like this. Stop it."
\Y[4 34]\{So the witch went to the prince's bedroom and saw the prince staring blankly at the air.
\Y[4 3]\{"Well, Your Highness, "the witch sighed, "your Cinderella loves stars."
\Y[4 35]\{"That kind of thing\..\..\.."\.The witch shook her head, "How could I possibly have it?"
\Y[4 36]\{The witch looked at the prince for a long time, her gaze penetrating
the thin veil, seeing the vast sea of stars in the prince's eyes.
\Y[4 35]\{Finally, she turned her face away and stopped looking at the prince\..\..\..
\Y[4 33]\{"Jack's beans can lead to the giant's castle, maybe there you can pick stars."
\Y[12]\{"You're tampering with fairy tales again\..\..\.."\.The girl stirred her coffee cup.
\Y[4 28]\C[1]"So the prince likes Cinderella, but Cinderella doesn't like the prince?"
\Y[4 28]\C[1]"Hey! Why are you looking at me?"
\Y[4 28]\C[1]"Tsk, I always feel like you're just humoring me."
\Y[4 27]\C[1]"The prince is picking stars for his Cinderella. Is there anything you want?"
\Y[4 28]\C[1]"Um\....\.the moon? But compared to that, I prefer the sun!"
\Y[12]\{He nodded, the corners of his mouth unconsciously curling up slightly.
\Y[12]\{"Alright, just kidding. "The girl finished her last sip of coffee.
\Y[4 34]\{When the dwarf arrived, the witch was fiddling with her broom and crystal ball in the ivory tower.
\Y[4 3]\{The sunlight was swept in from the balcony by the witch over and over again, making the whole room full of spring.
\Y[4 35]\{"Respected Lady Witch, please forgive my abruptness, may I invite you to visit our village?"
\Y[4 3]\{"It's an honor, my friend from afar, "the witch bowed slightly, murmuring a spell ambiguously.
\Y[4 34]\{Sunlight passed through the crystal ball, warmth and halos converged like dazzling colors...
\Y[4 35]\{The witch was collecting sunlight for the prince, which would replace the flickering candlelight.
\Y[4 3]\{Because the prince often read at night, the latter would weaken his eyesight.
\Y[4 36]\{"But you know, I can't leave here for now."
\Y[4 37]\{"I mean, the prince will return soon, and I have to be here to welcome his triumphant return!"
\Y[4 34]\{"If you are waiting for the prince\..\..\..\.I\..\..\..\.I'm sorry..."
\Y[4 3]\{The dwarf carefully chose his words, "I think\..\..\..\.."
\Y[4 3]\{"Um? "The witch's movements gradually slowed down. Although there
was a distance between them, the dwarf could clearly feel a chill...
\Y[4 35]\{The sunlight seemed to suddenly lose its warmth\..\..\..\..
\Y[4 36]\{"Your Highness... well, I want to tell you that the prince has fallen into a deep sleep\..\..\..\.."
\Y[4 37]\{As the teleportation array dissipated, the dwarf, the witch, and her crystal ball disappeared in an instant\..\..\..\..
\Y[4 36]\{As if they had never appeared in the tower\..\..\..
\Y[12]\{It had been a long time since she last saw him\..\..\..
\Y[12]\{It was as if he had evaporated from the face of the earth, suddenly disappearing from the city\..\..\..\..
\Y[12]\{Two days, three days, five days, until she found his friend.
\Y[12]\{"Do you know where he is? "she asked excitedly.
\Y[12]\{The friend nodded, "He's been at home all this time."
\Y[12]\{"Yeah, he must have gone crazy, going to climb the TACJAM Tower in the middle of the night by himself..."
\Y[12]\{"When he was going down the stairs, he slipped and ended up with both legs in casts..."
\Y[12]\{The friend looked up, recalling the incident. When he looked
back at the girl, she had already disappeared from his sight\..\..\..\..
\Y[4 3]\{The dwarfs were startled by the sudden appearance of the teleportation array,
but the witch had no intention of comforting these frightened creatures. Her
gaze was fixed on the spirit tree, eagerly searching for him.
\Y[4 3]\{Under the spirit tree, on the crystal bed, her prince lay quietly, covered with morning dew and fragrant grass.
\Y[4 3]\{"How could this happen? "the witch whispered softly, as if talking to herself.
\Y[4 3]\{"His Highness climbed up my beanstalk, got the stars, but the ferocious giant discovered us,"
Jack stood silently in front of the crystal bed, recounting the events in a low voice.
"The prince and the giant began to fight, and His Highness's sword blinded the giant's single eye..."
\Y[4 3]\{"I mean, "she continued softly, "how could he become like this\..\..\.."
\Y[4 3]\{"The one-eyed giant, blinded, went mad and attacked everything it could touch: the castle, His
Highness, and my beanstalk\..\..\..\. The castle was destroyed, and I fell from the clouds along
with His Highness\..\..\..\.I'm sorry, my beanstalk can only carry one person at a time\..\..\..\.."
\Y[4 3]\{"The dwarfs saved His Highness, and they treated all of his wounds, but His Highness remains unconscious\..\..\..\.."
\Y[4 3]\{"Jack," she interrupted Jack's words, looking at the sleeping prince,
"if His Highness cannot wake up, I will burn you and your beanstalk..."
\Y[4 3]\{Jack bowed and stepped back, and everyone fell silent, as if the air had been frozen.
\Y[4 18]\{"Perhaps there is still a way! "the elder dwarf suddenly said.
\Y[4 20]\{"Is there no other way? " the witch frowned.
\Y[4 24]\{"Alright, "she whispered softly, "then\..\..\..\.let me go ask Cinderella."
\Y[4 3]\{It is said that the dwarfs have a potion that, within a day, can
awaken the sleeper with a kiss from the person they deeply love\..\..\..
\Y[4 3]\{But the potion also has irreversible side effects. When the sun sets, if the sleeping person
has not been awakened, they will turn to dust and disappear forever into the vast night\..\..\..
\Y[4 3]\{This was the only and the last resort\..\..\..
\Y[4 3]\{They decided to go through with it.
\Y[4 3]\{"But I don't like the prince. "Cinderella still said.
\Y[4 3]\{However, she eventually went to the dwarf village - at the witch's repeated request,
Cinderella once again bid farewell to her loving father, stepmother, and two stepsisters,
\Y[4 26]\{"Do I really have to kiss him?"
\Y[4 29]\{"Um\..\..\.."\.the witch no longer looked at Cinderella.
\Y[4 3]\{The dwarf priest fed the prince the potion - the kind that, once drunk,
can be awakened by a kiss from the person the sleeper deeply loves.
\Y[4 3]\{So Cinderella closed her eyes and kissed him.
\Y[4 3]\{There was no effect, perhaps the legend was just a legend\..\..\..\..\..\..
\Y[4 3]\{The witch slumped to the ground, staring at the setting sun, lost in her thoughts.
No one could stop the sun from setting, not even a witch skilled in magic.
\Y[4 3]\{She knew that when the sun completely sank below the distant
mountains, he would turn to dust and disperse in the world.
\Y[4 3]\{"Your Highness the witch... "Jack came to her side, standing with
his hat in his hands, and the bean seed lay quietly in the hat."
\Y[4 3]\{"Let me be alone for a while," she whispered softly.
\Y[4 3]\{So, in the vast space, there was no witch and prince, only\..\..\..\.her and him\..\..\..
\Y[4 3]\{The sun gradually came to the edge of the mountain, casting long, long
shadows in the dusk. When the witch saw the prince's body becoming more
and more transparent, she realized that she was about to lose him\..\..\..
\Y[4 3]\{"Do you know, Your Highness, that I have always loved you?" the witch said to herself.
\Y[4 3]\{The prince slept, without any response, his handsome face
gradually becoming transparent, as if an illusion.
\Y[4 3]\{She suddenly seemed to go mad, only now realizing that she could not
accept the fact that the prince she deeply loved was going to leave her.
\Y[4 3]\{The distant mountains began to swallow the sunlight, and the
sky was dyed blood-red, as if the end of the world had come.
\Y[4 3]\{She smashed her crystal ball without hesitation, and in an instant, the dazzling,
colorful halo and warmth enveloped the entire spirit tree once more.
\Y[4 3]\{The prince's body regained some substance, but only
for a moment before it began to fade away again.
\Y[4 3]\{So, in her panic, she took off her veil, completely forgetting the fact that the prince had
risked everything to pick stars for his beloved Cinderella, and she deeply kissed him\..\..\..
\Y[4 13]"What were you thinking, climbing that building in the middle of the night? Are you a pig?"
\Y[4 5]"Sorry\....\.I wasn't paying attention to the road..."
\Y[4 11]"Stinky pig! Can't even watch where you're going! Stinky pig, stinky pig, stinky pig!"
\Y[4 5]"I'm sorry\..\..\..\.I\..\..\..\.I didn't expect you to come see me..."
\Y[4 11]"How dare you say that! Did you think you were playing a disappearing act? Vanishing for five or six days without even saying a word!"
\Y[12]\{The girl realized she had lost her composure and quickly changed the subject.
\Y[4 11]"Tell me! What were you doing at the TACJAM Tower at night?"
\Y[12]\{He stammered, guarding the door so she couldn't see inside.
\Y[4 11]"Hey, I'm telling you, you don't have another girl hidden in here, do you?"
\Y[12]\{He suddenly moved away from the door...
\Y[12]\{Table, chairs, computer, camera, and some scattered photos\..\..\..
\Y[12]\{She saw the curtains tightly closed, not a single ray of light,
and the table near the window was cluttered with old camera film.
\Y[12]\{Upon closer inspection, all the film recorded the sun\..\..\..\..
\Y[12]\{The prince and the witch, who later became a princess, lived happily together.
\Y[12]\{Many years later, the girl recalled this incident and finally
couldn't help her curiosity, asking him such a question.
\Y[12]\{This is the story of the prince and princess that I wanted to tell.
